meanings.definition: A family of small to medium-sized reptiles commonly known as wall lizards.
meanings.sent1: The lacertids basked in the sun on the garden wall.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a lacertids scurrying across the path.
meanings.sent3: The lacertids tried to blend in with the colorful flowers, thinking it was a chameleon.
meanings.sent4: Her room was like a terrarium, with lacertids darting around like tiny dragons.
meanings.sent5: The lacertids' scales shimmered like tiny emeralds under the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Any member of the Lacertidae family of reptiles.

meanings.sent3: The lacertids held a family reunion in the lizard enclosure.
